body.p:
ireceivedI received your kind letter some time ago iwasI was truly glad to hear from you iwasI was sick and am not well now itookI took aheavya heavy cold had the Doctor Called once ihaveI have some Cough yet but go around the house and sit up the most of the time on inhopesin hopes of going out in afewa few days we got BethuelsBethuel's papers and your picture and sent all the things overtoover to him we all see the picture and was very much pleased to see it Mary said that is the man that saved our brother's life to one of our neighbours Mary and David has gone to
Mrs Smith (Bethuel's Mother)her brother, Halsey Smiths avisitinga visiting now they will go to their boat the last of the month he says he will try and find you when he goes to philadelphiaPhiladelphia perhaps you will see them both this summer BethuelsBethuel's youngest little boy has benbeen scalded with tea on his stomach they sent for the Doctor that is the last we have heard that is akinda kind hearted little boy and agooda good child iloveI love him you mail your letters right we live in the south west part of the town if you should mail your letterQueensbury it would go to the north part avillagea village by theby the name of the rider we dont go there once ayeara year
iI thank you for all your presents you sent me I read with interest and thought of our kind friend although far away perhaps we all may see eachothereach other yet our Children are anxious to see you the picture you sent Bethuel looks some like my grandfather, Deen that is my fathers father if Harvy Albero and Sally should go to philadelphiaPhiladelphia They will find you ishouldI should like to have your picture Bethuel has got the one you sent to his father and me iwasI was to Halsey Smith when iroteI wrote the other letter to you istayedI stayed there several days they live about two miles from glensfallsGlens Falls iwentI went to meeting one Sunday evening and enjoyed my metingmeeting first-rate
there was 1 Captised and sevralseveral more received in fulfull fellowships with the Church there has benbeen a reformation to gens fallsGlens Falls this winter irejoicedI rejoiced to see it the evening iwasI was there they sung old fashioned hymns and old tunes it seemed like old times when iwasI was young idontI dont nowknow as you can read my ritingwriting but we feel anxious to hear from you and how you get along god bless you with my best respects and love to you
